badges.text:
§b§lClick %s:§r
§d- And hold it to §eRELOCATE§d constantly near the target§r
§d- And hold §r[Sneak]§d to §eGLITCH§d out with corrupted objects§r
§d- Outside of the code everything takes constant dmg and can't move except for Corr who can travel through it

name: §a§nOut of Code
description: §dCorr found his home not to be within the code or exists. This place can't be accessed by not corrupted beings and corrupted ones can't move in it except Corr.
